r.s: Provides a POP3 class to access POP3 server.
r.d: Provides a POP3 class to access POP3 server. Support all POP3 commands including UIDL listings, APOP authentication,DIGEST-MD5 and CRAM-MD5 using optional Auth_SASL package
r.n: * Added debug capabilities * Added _recvLn() and _send($data) to support debug and better check socket errors * Added SASL AUTH capabilities * if installed automatically uses Auth_SASL * Added LOGIN,PLAIN,DIGEST-MD5 and CRAM-MD5 * Modified APOP and USER auths * Now the class automagically selects the best auth method
